abstractText: Many different structures have been used to age fish, including scales and otoliths, with otoliths generally considered a preferable structure for older fish. The largest pair of otoliths, sagittal otoliths, is most commonly used for age determination. This method describes how we collect sagittal otoliths from fish that will be used for age and growth.
title: Collecting Sagittal Otoliths for Ageing v1.0
